name: Universal Remote Man
description:
V0.02 (The game may take a minute or two to load for the first time)

Currently the game is just a movement prototype with some early functionality to let you control various environmental objects (desk fans!)

KEYBOARD/MOUSE CONTROLS:

  • Move: A & D or ARROW KEYS
  • Jump: SPACEBAR
  • Dash: LEFT SHIFT
  • Control  closest electronic: Q or LEFT CLICK
  • Change electronic selection: SCROLLWHEEL

XBOX GAMEPAD CONTROLS:

  • Move: LEFT JOYSTICK
  • Jump: A
  • Dash: B
  • Control  closest electronic: LB
  • Change electronic selection: RIGHT JOYSTICK
